ElementDescription: Recurrent opioid use in situations in which it is physically hazardous.

Withdrawal, as manifested by either of the following: 1) The characteristic opioid withdrawal syndrome; 2) The same (or a closely related) substance are taken to relieve or avoid withdrawal symptoms.
